en.title: Internet Access: eSIM & VPNs
en.subtitle: Crossing the 'Great Firewall' and staying connected

pain_point.title: The Core Challenge: The Great Firewall
pain_point.content: China's 'Great Firewall' blocks access to Google, WhatsApp, Instagram, YouTube, and many other Western services. Securing reliable internet access is your #1 survival priority upon arrival.

solutions.title: eSIM (Highly Recommended)
solutions.description: The most stable and hassle-free solution for travelers.
pros: Data routed via HK/Singapore, bypassing the GFW automatically.
solutions.advice: Set this up on your phone before you board your flight.

solutions.title: VPN + Local SIM
solutions.description: Traditional method, but becoming less reliable.
cons: Requires purchasing a local Chinese SIM (China Unicom/Mobile).
VPNs are actively blocked during sensitive periods.
Connections can be unstable and drain battery life.
solutions.advice: Not recommended for short trips (e.g. 10-day visa-free transit).

warning.title: The Public Wi-Fi Trap
warning.content: Airport and public Wi-Fi networks usually require SMS Verification to log in. If you don't have a working roaming number or local SIM yet, you will be unable to connect, leading to 'digital isolation' immediately after landing.

zh.title: 网络连接：eSIM 与 VPN
zh.subtitle: 穿越'防火墙'，保持时刻在线

pain_point.title: 核心痛点：防火墙 (Great Firewall)
pain_point.content: 中国大陆存在'防火墙'，导致 Google, WhatsApp, Instagram, YouTube 等服务无法直接访问。解决网络连接是入境后的首要生存任务。

solutions.title: eSIM (推荐方案)
solutions.description: 目前最稳定、最省心的方案。
pros: 漫游数据通过香港或新加坡路由，自带'翻墙'效果。
无需额外配置 VPN 即可直接访问外网应用。

solutions.title: VPN (虚拟专用网)
solutions.description: 传统方案，但稳定性较差。
cons: 如果购买中国本地 SIM 卡（联通/移动），必须配合 VPN 使用。
VPN 在敏感时期常受干扰，连接不稳定。
solutions.advice: 如果是短期旅行（如10天过境免签），不建议作为首选。

warning.title: Wi-Fi 陷阱
warning.content: 机场和公共场所的 Wi-Fi 通常需要短信验证码 (SMS Verification) 才能登录。如果没有能漫游的手机号或本地 SIM 卡，这一步会卡住，导致落地即失联。

en.title: Mobile Payment: Alipay & WeChat
en.subtitle: Surviving China's Cashless Society

pain_point.title: Core Context: A Cashless Society
pain_point.content: China has largely moved away from cash. Physical credit cards (Visa/Mastercard) are only accepted in high-end hotels and malls. Without mobile payment, daily life—from buying water to taking the subway—is nearly impossible.

steps.title: Download & Register
steps.content: Download the international version of Alipay or WeChat. Register using your overseas phone number.

steps.title: Link International Cards
steps.content: Link your Visa, Mastercard, or JCB card directly in the app's 'Wallet' section. (The complex 'TourCard' is no longer needed—direct binding works well now).

steps.title: Verify Identity
steps.content: Complete the 'Real-name Authentication' by uploading your passport photo. Do this BEFORE arrival to avoid network issues.

tips: WeChat and Alipay are 'Super Apps'—use them for ride-hailing, food delivery, and metro tickets, not just paying.
Always carry a small amount of cash (RMB) and a physical card as a backup.

zh.title: 移动支付：支付宝与微信
zh.subtitle: 无现金社会的生存指南

pain_point.title: 核心背景：无现金社会
pain_point.content: 中国现金使用场景大幅萎缩，信用卡（Visa/Mastercard）直接刷卡仅限于高档酒店和商场。没有移动支付几乎寸步难行。

steps.title: 下载与注册
steps.content: 下载国际版 Alipay 或 WeChat，使用海外手机号注册。

steps.title: 绑定外卡
steps.content: 直接在 APP 钱包 (Wallet) 中添加 Visa, Mastercard, JCB 等国际信用卡。无需再使用复杂的 'TourCard'，直接绑定更稳定。

steps.title: 实名认证
steps.content: 需要上传护照照片进行身份验证。建议在抵达中国前完成，以免受限于网络环境。

fees.title: 手续费规则
items: 单笔消费 200元人民币以下：免收手续费。
单笔消费 200元人民币以上：通常收取约 3% 的服务费。

tips: 支付宝和微信不仅仅是支付工具，它们是'超级应用'，内置了打车、外卖、地铁卡等功能。
虽然普及，但仍建议携带少量人民币现金和实体卡作为应急备份。

pain_point.title: Paperless Travel
pain_point.content: China's High-Speed Rail (HSR) is the backbone of inter-city travel. The system is entirely paperless—your passport is your ticket.

platforms.name: Trip.com
cons: Charges a small service fee per ticket.

platforms.name: 12306 (Official App)
cons: Requires 'Identity Verification' which involves manual review.
Process can take hours or verify fail for foreigners.
Interface and support are less foreigner-friendly.

boarding_tip.title: Boarding the Train
boarding_tip.content: Look for the 'Manual Lane' (Staff Lane) at the station gates. Show your passport to the staff or scan the photo page at supported automated gates.

pain_point.title: 无纸化通关
pain_point.content: 高铁 (High-Speed Rail) 是跨城旅行的首选。目前实行'无纸化'通关，护照就是车票。

platforms.name: Trip.com (携程国际版)
pros: 支持国际信用卡直接支付。
提供 24/7 英文客服，解决改签和抢票沟通问题。
cons: 每张票会收取少量服务费。

platforms.name: 12306 (铁路官方APP)
cons: 外国用户注册需要进行'实名核验'。
通常需要上传护照页照片等待人工审核，耗时较长，未通过前无法购票。

boarding_tip.title: 乘车提示
boarding_tip.content: 进站时需走 人工通道 (Manual Lane) 或使用支持护照识别的自助闸机，直接扫描护照信息页进站。

pain_point.title: The App Ecosystem
pain_point.content: Western apps often don't work or lack local data. You need the local equivalents to navigate, communicate, and travel.

apps.name: Apple Maps
apps.desc: Best for iOS users. Works without VPN and data is highly accurate.

apps.name: Amap (Gaode) / Baidu Maps
apps.desc: Most complete data (even public toilets), but interface is Chinese-only. Good if you can read some characters.

apps.name: DiDi (Greater China)
apps.desc: China's Uber. The 'Greater China' version has an English interface and in-app realtime chat translation. Crucial for avoiding scams.

apps.name: DeepL / Google Translate
apps.desc: Download offline language packs before you arrive.

apps.name: Alipay
apps.desc: Use the built-in 'Scan' -> 'Translate' feature for restaurant menus.

apps.name: Digital Arrival Card
apps.desc: New from Nov 2025. Fill out online to generate a QR code for entry, replacing paper forms.

advice.title: Strategic Advice
advice.content: Don't book your entire trip, but DO book your first night's hotel. Save the hotel name/address in Chinese (screenshot) to show taxi drivers.

pain_point.title: 应用生态
pain_point.content: 西方主流应用在中国通常无法使用或缺乏数据。你需要本地应用来导航、交流和出行。

apps.name: Apple Maps
apps.desc: iOS 用户首选。无需 VPN 即可使用，数据准确度高。

apps.name: 高德地图 / 百度地图
apps.desc: 数据最全、定位最准（甚至能找到公共厕所），但仅有中文界面。

apps.name: DiDi (滴滴出行)
apps.desc: 中国版 Uber。国际版支持全英文界面和实时翻译。使用网约车可避免遭遇'黑车'宰客。

apps.name: Alipay 翻译
apps.desc: 扫描餐厅菜单二维码时，Alipay 提供一键翻译功能。

apps.name: 电子入境卡
apps.desc: 2025年11月起，可通过网络提前填写，生成二维码扫码入境，取代纸质填表。

advice.title: 实用建议
advice.content: 不要预订所有行程，但必须预订第一晚的酒店。将酒店名称、地址（中文版）截图保存在手机相册中，打车或问路时直接展示给司机看。
